short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will Take a SalesForce Id and open up the actual record in SalesForce

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter a Salesforce Id into the textbox and it will open the record in Salesforce. You can enter your Org Instance on the options page. Defaults are Production => "na13" and Testing => "cs16".
